description: The floating ice hand will leave your party guests horrified in the best way, so calm them down with this berry-lemonade punch.
name: Poison Apple Punch Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer strawberry topping to a piping bag. Run the piping bag around the rim of the punch bowl, varying the pressure to create drips of strawberry topping down the sides of the bowl.
